problem.p: A small uniform solid disc is allowed to roll down from the top of an inclined plane. The disc takes time \(t_1\) to reach the bottom of the plane, rolling without slipping. Then the same disc is released from rest at the top of another inclined plane, identical to the first one in every respect except that it is frictionless. How long (\(t_2\)) would it take the disc to reach the bottom of the second inclined plane?
